The issue is with protobuf version. The protobuf 2.6.1 is very old and doesn't have the GeneratedMessageV3 class. However, we need to be careful because Mesos 1.11.0 might require specific protobuf versions. Let me check what protobuf version Mesos 1.11.0 uses:
